scripts.dev: start npm run livereload && start npm run watch && start npm run serve
scripts.predev: rimraf tmp && rimraf tmpp && rimraf build && rimraf dist && npm run browserify:lib
scripts.prepublish: rimraf tmp && rimraf tmpp && rimraf build && rimraf dist && npm run browserify:lib
scripts.copy:misc:nix: cd src && tar cf - --exclude=*.js --exclude=*.ts --exclude=*.tsx --exclude=*.scss . | ( cd ../build && tar xvf - )
scripts.copy:third-party:nix: if [ -d src/third-party ]; then mkdir build/third-party && cp -r src/third-party build/third-party; fi
scripts.copy:dist: (robocopy build\ dist\ /s ) ^& IF %ERRORLEVEL% LEQ 1 exit 0 && rimraf build
scripts.copy: npm run copy:third-party && npm run copy:misc
scripts.copy:nix: npm run copy:third-party:nix && npm run copy:misc:nix
scripts.browserify: browserify tmpp/game/hud/src/index.js -o build/js/hud.js --fast --noparse=FILE -u react -u react-dom -u jquery -u es6-promise -u camelot-unchained -u react-draggable -u react-uedux -u react-select -u redux -u redux-thunk
scripts.browserify:lib: browserify -r react -r react-dom -r jquery -r es6-promise -r camelot-unchained -r react-draggable -r react-redux -r react-select -r redux -r redux-thunk > build/js/lib.js
scripts.build: tsc && npm run copy -s && npm run babel && npm run browserify && npm run build:sass
scripts.build:nix: tsc && npm run copy:nix -s && npm run babel && npm run browserify && npm run build:sass && rimraf build && npm run clean:tmp -s && npm run clean:tmpp -s
scripts.build:hatchery: npm run build && npm run clean:hatchery && npm run copy:hatchery
scripts.build:wyrmling: npm run build && npm run clean:wyrmling && npm run copy:wyrmling
scripts.build:cube: npm run build && npm run clean:cube && npm run copy:cube
